Title: GDPR Adoption by Council
Description: Council of the European Union adopted GDPR

Title: GDPR Official Publication
Description: Published in Official Journal of the European Union

Title: GDPR Entry into Force
Description: GDPR entered into force 20 days after publication

Title: GDPR Enforcement Date
Description: GDPR became enforceable (2 years after entry into force)

Title: ePrivacy Directive 2002/58/EC
Description: Related directive on privacy in electronic communications (Article 95)

Title: Standard Contractual Clauses
Description: New SCCs for international data transfers adopted

Title: Adequacy Decisions
Description: Commission adequacy decisions for third countries (Article 45)
